title: Error: Cannot find module '@ethersproject/transactions' when deploy the deploy.js file

labels.name: status:needs-more-info
labels.description: There's not enough information to start working on this issue

body:
Hey @sniper365,

Thanks for opening this issue. Do you have a repository where we can reproduce it? Thanks

Hey, @alcuadrado.

Yeah. I made git repository for reproducing. 

[https://github.com/sniper365/pancakeswap-contracts](https://github.com/sniper365/pancakeswap-contracts)

Thank you.

@sniper365 I can't reproduce this. Which version of node are you using? And yarn?

Try removing the `node_modules` directory and running `yarn` again, and then try to run the script again. Does that fix this?

I'm going to close this because I'm pretty sure it's not a Hardhat issue. Please join our [discord server](https://hardhat.org/discord) if you need more help with this. And, of course, please re-open if you think this is indeed a problem on our side.
